```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE, 
                      message = FALSE, 
                      warning = FALSE,
                      fig.width = 6.5, 
                      fig.height = 8)
library(tidyverse)
library(rio)
library(janitor)
library(dplyr)
library(here)
```



```{r commit 1}
star <- import(here("data", "star.csv"))
star <- star %>% 
  clean_names()
```



```{r commit 3}
star %>% 
  group_by(sex, frl) %>% 
  summarize(math_mean = mean(tmathss), math_sd = sd(tmathss),
         rdg_mean = mean(treadss), rdg_sd = sd(treadss)) %>%
  select(sex, frl, math_mean, math_sd, rdg_mean, rdg_sd) %>% 
  as.tibble()
  
```
